955810.name: Fantasy Grounds - Monstrous Characters, Volume 5 (Token Pack)
955810.description:
Monstrous Characters, Volume 5

Make your game more monstrous with Monster Grin's 176 unique new tokens, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, monsters, or bosses! This pack contains both the "Normal" and the "Monstrous" forms of several characters: human males and females as well as their skeletal and were beast forms - perfect for before and after changes in game! This tokens will amp up the awesome monster potential for your game.
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what's what and who's who and keep your game rockin'!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):
  • Human Male in "Normal" Form
  • Human Male in "Monstrous" Werebeast Form
  • Human Female in "Normal" Form
  • Human Female in "Monstrous" Werebeast Form
  • Human Male in "Normal" Form
  • Human Male in "Monstrous" Skeleton Form
  • Human Female in "Normal" Form
  • Human Female in "Monstrous" Skeleton Form
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
